name: Physical Development
description: Gross and fine motor skills, coordination, strength, physical health, nutrition, and body awareness.

name: Cognitive Development
description: Problem-solving, memory, attention, logical thinking, creativity, and academic skills.

description: Integrity, responsibility, respect, kindness, perseverance, and moral development.
